intro.description: This cheat sheet shows you how to run reports and export them in different formats.

item.title: Switch to preview mode
item.description: Open a report, and click on "Preview" tab on the bottom of the editor.

item.title: Run the report
item.description: If data adapter is allready selected for this report, execution will start automaticaly.

item.title: Preview the report
item.description: Use navigation and zoom buttons from the toolbar to view report pages.

item.title: Export report
item.description: On the preview editor toolbar press "Export" icon and select the format you want to export. The file dialog will ask the location where report will be exported.
